name: Aqua Simulacra
title: Wisdom of Mutability: Aqua Simulacra
desc: "It is in defense of the purity of the source that water's gentleness can also become as blade and bow.\nConspiracy and coded language are interwoven with ease under the pale blue full moon â€” this is the wisdom of water's shape."
in_play_description:
When the character to which this is attached has at least 11 HP: DMG +2.
When played: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Max HP.
